title: 2 bedroom 1.5 bathroom apartment available now!
posting_body: Cleveland , 2 bedroom 1.5 bathroom apartment available now!
Working on removing furniture left by former tenant.
All major utilities included: heat, water, sewer, sanitation and electric.
Tenant responsible for phone, cable and internet.
Pets allowed for additional monthly fee of $5 per pet.
Rent is $675 per month You would share the kitchen and family room with the other two tenants.
The house has a small but complete kitchen, a "family room" no tv, an indoor washer/dryer, and 1 parking space per tenant.
It is in a lovely quiet neighborhood.
If you are looking for a comfortable place, with nice and considerate people that you won't see much of, this might be the place you are looking for.no Smoke, pet free environment.
The neighbor has chickens that are rather loud in the morning and can definitely be heard from your room.
If you are interested please text:::::::~
